com.sudoplay.axion.registry

Class RegistryAccessor

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.sudoplay.axion.registry.RegistryAccessor
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    TagAdapter, TagConverter

    public abstract class RegistryAccessor
extends java.lang.Object
    The RegistryAccessor class holds a reference to a TagRegistry and allows sub-classes read-only access to the registry.
    Author:
    Jason Taylor

        protected TagAdapter<Tag> getBaseTagAdapter()
                                     throws AxionTagRegistrationException
        Returns the base TagAdapter.

        If no base tag adapter has been registered, an exception is thrown.

        the base TagAdapter
        Throws:
        AxionTagRegistrationException
        See Also:

      • getAdapterFor

        protected <A extends Tag> TagAdapter<A> getAdapterFor(java.lang.Class<A> tagClass)
                                           throws AxionTagRegistrationException
        Returns the TagAdapter registered for the given tag class.

        If no adapter is found, an exception is thrown.

        Parameters:
        tagClass - the tag class of the TagAdapter
        Returns:
        the TagAdapter registered for the given tag class
        Throws:
        AxionTagRegistrationException

      • convertToTag

        protected <A extends Tag,B> A convertToTag(java.lang.String name,
                               B value)
                              throws AxionTagRegistrationException
        Converts a value to its Tag using the TagConverter registered for the given value.

        If no converter is found, an exception is thrown.

        Parameters:
        name - the name of the new tag
        value - the value to convert
        Returns:
        a new Tag converted from the given value
        Throws:
        AxionTagRegistrationException

      • convertToValue

        protected <A extends Tag,B> B convertToValue(A tag)
                    throws AxionTagRegistrationException
        Converts a Tag to its value using the TagConverter registered for the given Tag.

        If no converter is found, an exception is thrown.

        Parameters:
        tag - the Tag to convert
        Returns:
        a new value converted from the given Tag
        Throws:
        AxionTagRegistrationException
